Error Messages: All fields are mandatory. Please check the fields below.
Error Alert Messages: Please fill out all empty fields!
rating_alert: You can't provide a rating at this moment, because some employees 360 reviews are still incomplete. Please reach out to the relevant parties to follow up on these reviews.
rating_employee_single: If there is only 1 employee, the Rater can select any rating between ':secondKey' - ':lastKey'.
rating_employee_double: If there are 2 employees, you can select any rating between ':firstKey' - ':lastKey'. However, the selected rating will be available to be allocated only 1 time.
Text Not Allowed: Some employees are still incomplete. Please reach out to the pending employees.
Text Mismatch_1: The following rating does not meet the expected target
Text Mismatch_2: Please adjust the given ratings to meet the specified rules and targets. Rows that do not comply are highlighted in red in the table.
Text Ratings are Empty: Please select a rating for all employees.
